raw: Hong Kong-listed ESR Cayman posts revenue rise, says e-commerce logistics property to grow thanks to pandemic .
replaced: Hong Kong-listed ESR Cayman posts revenue rise, says e-commerce logistics property to grow thanks to pandemic .

raw: E - commerce will continue to grow in the Asia - Pacific region , accelerated by the Covid-19 outbreak , Hong Kong - listed logistics warehouses and industrial real - estate operator ESR Cayman said on Monday .
replaced: E - commerce will continue to grow in the Asia - Pacific region , accelerated by the Covid-19 outbreak , Hong Kong - listed logistics warehouses and ESR said on Monday .

raw: In its year - end earnings web conference , the company also reported a 40.6 per cent rise in revenue for 2019 to US$ 357 million .
replaced: In Hong Kong-listed ESR Cayman year - end earnings web conference , Hong Kong-listed ESR Cayman also reported a 40.6 per cent rise in revenue for 2019 to US$ 357 million .

raw: Its net profit climbed 20.8 per cent to US$ 245 million .
replaced: Hong Kong-listed ESR Cayman net profit climbed 20.8 per cent to US$ 245 million .

raw: Jeffrey Perlman , ESR ’s chairman , said that Asia - Pacific logistics remained the largest property investment opportunity in the region , adding that its e - commerce tenants remained the bedrock of ESR ’s business , constituting about 60 per cent of its clients .
replaced: Perlman  ESR ’s chairman , said that Asia - Pacific logistics remained the largest property investment opportunity in the Asia - Pacific region , adding that Hong Kong-listed ESR Cayman e - commerce tenants remained the bedrock of ESR ’s business , constituting about 60 per cent of Hong Kong-listed ESR Cayman clients .

raw: He also said he did not expect a slowdown in business due to the spread of the virus to the European Union , the United States and other import - focused markets , as “ 99 per cent of our business is focused around domestic consumption ” .
replaced: Perlman also said Perlman did not expect a slowdown in business due to the spread of the virus to the European Union , the United States and other import - focused markets , as “ 99 per cent of Hong Kong-listed ESR Cayman  ESR ’s business is focused around domestic consumption ” .

raw: He cited reports that Chinese e - commerce giant JD.com expected a 10 per cent rise in revenue for first quarter of 2020 , despite the impact of the coronavirus on China ’s economy .
replaced: Perlman cited reports that JD expected a 10 per cent rise in revenue for first quarter of 2020 , despite the impact of the coronavirus on China ’s economy .

raw: JD is ESR ’s largest tenant , responsible for 11.1 per cent of its rental income .
replaced: JD is ESR ’s largest tenant , responsible for 11.1 per cent of JD rental income .

raw: Perlman also suggested further investment in logistics real estate would be forthcoming from ESR , even in 2020 .
replaced: Perlman also suggested further investment in logistics real estate would be forthcoming from ESR , even in 2020 .

raw: He said the company was in a relatively strong position as far as cash was concerned , with US$ 2 billion in dry powder waiting to be deployed , likely in tier-1 Asian cities .
replaced: Perlman said JD was in a relatively strong position as far as cash was concerned , with US$ 2 billion in dry powder waiting to be deployed , likely in tier-1 Asian cities .

raw: Jeffrey Perlman , the chairman of ESR Cayman , centre , at the company ’s listing ceremony in Hong Kong in November last year .
replaced: Perlman at the company ’s listing ceremony in Hong Kong in November last year .

raw: Photo : Jonathan Wong
replaced: Photo : Jonathan Wong

raw: More
replaced: More

raw: He estimated that changes brought by the spread of the coronavirus in Asia and the reshaping of trade flows would benefit ESR .
replaced: Perlman estimated that changes brought by the spread of the coronavirus in Asia and the reshaping of trade flows would benefit ESR .

raw: Just - in - time delivery models would have to be rethought , he said , as suppliers might need to stockpile more products for local needs and , therefore , need more logistics space .
replaced: Just - in - time delivery models would have to be rethought , Perlman said , as suppliers might need to stockpile more products for local needs and , therefore , need more logistics space .

raw: Jeffrey Shen , the company ’s co - CEO and co - founder , said that just two construction projects out of 43 that ESR was engaged in were still being halted by the Chinese authorities .
replaced: Jeffrey Shen , the company ’s co - CEO and co - founder , said that just two construction projects out of 43 that ESR was engaged in were still being halted by the Chinese authorities .

raw: The company also said that only two of its 157 properties currently in operation were closed .
replaced: ESR also said that only two of ESR 157 properties currently in operation were closed .

raw: In November 2019 , ESR listed in Hong Kong and raised US$ 600 million in new capital from a US$ 1.8 billion IPO .
replaced: In November 2019 , ESR listed in Hong Kong and raised US$ 600 million in new capital from a US$ 1.8 billion IPO .

raw: In addition to directly owning logistics properties in China , Japan , South Korea , Singapore , Australia and India , it also manages funds that hold logistics properties .
replaced: In addition to directly owning logistics properties in China , Japan , South Korea , Singapore , Australia and India , ESR also manages funds that hold logistics properties .

raw: Perlman said Indonesia and Vietnam were the next two countries of greatest interest to ESR .
replaced: Perlman said Indonesia and Vietnam were the next two countries of greatest interest to ESR .

raw: As of December 31 , 2019 , the company ’s gross floor area had grown 42.8 per cent year on year to 17.2 million square metres , mainly in its core markets of China , Japan and South Korea .
replaced: As of December 31 , 2019 , ESR ’s gross floor area had grown 42.8 per cent year on year to 17.2 million square metres , mainly in ESR core markets of China , Japan and South Korea .
